meanings.definition: Not contributing to a cause or result.
meanings.sent1: Her noncontributory attitude towards the group project led to a lower grade for the team.
meanings.sent2: The noncontributory behavior of the lazy student affected the overall success of the class.
meanings.sent3: The noncontributory squirrel refused to gather nuts for the winter, causing chaos in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His noncontributory role in the play was like a shadow, present but unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The noncontributory clouds blocked the sun, casting a gloomy shadow over the field.

meanings.sent1: The noncontributory membership offered no discounts or perks to its holders.
meanings.sent2: His noncontributory suggestions did not improve the situation at all.
meanings.sent3: The noncontributory umbrella flipped inside out in the wind, leaving him soaked.
meanings.sent4: Her noncontributory advice was like a broken compass, leading them astray.
meanings.sent5: The noncontributory map failed to guide them through the maze, causing confusion.

meanings.sent1: The noncontributory role of the audience was to simply observe the performance.
meanings.sent2: His noncontributory presence at the meeting went unnoticed by the team.
meanings.sent3: The noncontributory ghost floated through the walls, uninterested in the living.
meanings.sent4: Her noncontributory status in the group made her feel like a mere spectator.
meanings.sent5: The noncontributory bystander watched the events unfold without interference.
